Control Name: 14.1.2 Securing application services on public networks
Control Statement: Check how transaction integrity, confidentiality, availability and prevention of mis-routing are achieved.  Are transactions performed and stored in a secure internal environment (not open to the Internet!)?  Do they meet all jurisdictional legal, regulatory and compliance requirements?
